name: Parkour Flight Of Dummy
description:
Start your never-ending hot roof running contest being a parkour sticky man! Learn various tracing skills riding on your own feet through these awesome skies, perform various stunts and tricks right in the jumping moment and do everything possible to avoid falls! Play this exciting Parkour Flight Of Dummy game and feel the atmosphere of a real roof parkour jumping!

Parkour Flight Of Dummy features:
• Skyscraper parkour jumping contest
• Fascinating sticky man as the main hero
• Many amazing tracer stunts and tricks
• Interesting boosters to collect
• Dangerous obstacles on your way
• Various skins for your super sticky tracer
• Exciting city roof locations

Download our new Parkour Flight Of Dummy game and dip into the atmosphere of a real roof jumping contest – you can become the most skillful sticky jumper ever!
